section_full_path: Sign up > New Onboarding > Inactive locations
title: Verify Pro is able to complete onboarding flow at an inactive location without region mapping
custom_preconds:
Ensure enhanced_onboarding_experience exp is enabled

Launch BS and change device location to an inactive location without region mapping: Japan

custom_steps_separated.content:
Launch app on BS and tap "Create account" -> Proceed to complete the onboarding flow

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/yza12345-9999-0000-1111-222222222201)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AdminPortal:
- Check user profile object: account status should be "active"



Pro app
- Pro should be able to complete the onboarding flow
- pro should be landed on Preview screen (“We’re not available in <city name> yet with “Coming soon” image)
-- Currently there is an issue where after killing and relaunching the app, pro will see the Open shifts screen instead: https://project-tracker.example.com/tasks/45680

  ![](index.php?/attachments/get/yza12345-9999-0000-1111-222222222202) 



Note: 
- If you signed up at an active location without changing to an inactive location, pro should see the "Open shifts" screen once the account is created
